verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are the source of life
I can't be left behind
No one else will do
I will lay hold of You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I need You Jesus to come to my rescue
Where else can I go?
There's no other name by which I am saved
Capture me with grace
I will follow You

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
This world has nothing for me
I will follow You
This world has nothing for me
I will follow You
